org.primaresearch.shared.variable

Interface Variable

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    BaseVariable, BooleanVariable, DoubleVariable, IntegerVariable, StringVariable

    public interface Variable
extends java.io.Serializable
    Interface for variables holding values.
    Author:
    clc

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static class  Variable.WrongVariableTypeException
      Exception for calls to setValue() with value object that doesn't match the variable type.

    • Method Detail

      • getName

        java.lang.String getName()
        Returns the internal name of the variable.

      • setName

        void setName(java.lang.String name)

      • getCaption

        java.lang.String getCaption()
        Returns the display name of the variable.

      • setCaption

        void setCaption(java.lang.String caption)
        Sets the display name of the variable.

      • getValue

        VariableValue getValue()
        Returns the value of the variable.
        Returns:
        A wrapper containing the value or null if the variable is 'not set'.

      • setValue

        void setValue(VariableValue value)
       throws Variable.WrongVariableTypeException,
              java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Sets the variable value
        Parameters:
        value - Wrapper containing the actual value. Use null to mark the variable as 'not set'.
        Throws:
        Variable.WrongVariableTypeException
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - The value doesn't comply with a constraint.

      • parseValue

        void parseValue(java.lang.String valueInTextForm)
        Sets the variable value by parsing the given string.
        Parameters:
        valueInTextForm - String representing the new variable value.

      • clone

        Variable clone()
        Creates a deep copy of this variable.

      • setConstraint

        void setConstraint(VariableConstraint constraint)
        Sets a constraint for this variable (e.g. minimum and maximum for numbers).
        Parameters:
        constraint - Constraint implementation

      • getConstraint

        VariableConstraint getConstraint()
        Returns the constraint for this variable (e.g. minimum and maximum for numbers).
        Returns:
        Constraint object or null if there is no constraint

      • getId

        int getId()
        Returns the ID of this variable
        Returns:
        ID number

      • setId

        void setId(int id)
        Sets the ID of this variable
        Parameters:
        id - ID number

      • getSortIndex

        int getSortIndex()
        Returns the sort index of this variable. Sort indexes are used in VariableMaps for instance.
        Returns:
        Current sort index

      • setSortIndex

        void setSortIndex(int index)
        Sets the sort index of this variable. Sort indexes are used in VariableMaps for instance.
        Parameters:
        index - New sort index

      • isVisible

        boolean isVisible()
        Recommendation for visibility of this variable in graphical user interfaces
        Returns:
        true if this variable should be shown, false otherwise

      • setVisible

        void setVisible(boolean vis)
        Sets recommendation for visibility of this variable in graphical user interfaces
        Parameters:
        vis - Set to true if this variable should be shown, false otherwise

      • getDescription

        java.lang.String getDescription()
        Returns the description text for this variable
        Returns:
        Text

      • setDescription

        void setDescription(java.lang.String text)
        Sets the description text for this variable
        Parameters:
        text - Description

      • isReadOnly

        boolean isReadOnly()
        Recommendation for permission to edit of this variable in graphical user interfaces
        Returns:
        true if this variable should be read-only, false otherwise

      • setReadOnly

        void setReadOnly(boolean readOnly)
        Sets recommendation for permission to edit of this variable in graphical user interfaces
        Parameters:
        readOnly - Set to true if this variable should be read-only, false otherwise

      • getVersion

        int getVersion()
        Returns the version of this variable. Versions can be used in conjunction with saved variables to force updates.
        Returns:
        Version number

      • setVersion

        void setVersion(int v)
        Sets the version of this variable. Versions can be used in conjunction with saved variables to force updates.
        Parameters:
        v - Version number
